main event: An unidentified flying object was reported in Lansing, Michigan on May 20, 1964, with multiple witnesses describing strange noises and sightings.
interesting points: The reports include observations of a bright blue or blue-green light descending to the ground,Many residents reported hearing a weird whirring noise at approximately 3 AM, which was later connected to a police emergency run,One witness described seeing a large object moving in loops,At least one report mentioned an elephant nearby, possibly contributing to confusion over the odd sounds,Several individuals delayed reporting their sightings due to fear of ridicule.
sighted object: A bright blue or blue-green light, possibly a balloon or an aircraft
witness description: Local residents, including a reporter and police officers
